H0.text: What was the Paramount Film Company originally called. Paramount Pictures Corporation

H1.text: What was the Paramount Film Company originally called. Famous Players

H2.text: What was the Paramount Film Company originally called. Lasky Feature Play Company

H3.text: What was the Paramount Film Company originally called. Raleigh Studios

A4.text: Paramount Pictures dates its existence from the 1912 founding date of the Famous Players Film Company.

A5.text: On May 8, 1914, Paramount Pictures Corporation (previously known as Progressive Pictures) was founded by a Utah theatre owner, W. W. Hodkinson, who had bought and merged five smaller firms.
